Posts.Title: My most stressful work situation
Posts.Author: Marina Sundström
Posts.Excerpt:
In the most stressful time was working during the pandemic.

I was the sole software developer working for a lone entrepreneur with the goal of building an e-commerce solution from scratch. It was a fun creative experience - but the person that I worked for had some personality issues.

It became somewhat apparent that he was very rude an threatening to people. He shifted the blame to others instead. Blame for his situation. It was obvious to me that he was a traumatized type. He...
